question.questionText: Betty was puzzled. In the morning the shadow of the bus sign is in the street. In the afternoon the shadow of the bus sign points the opposite direction. Explain to Betty why this happens.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: In the morning the Sun is in the east so shadows point west. In the afternoon the Sun is in the west so shadows point east.
